msg: Update commons-lang to 2.0, defining version of commons-discovery, updating info of jars.xml and status.xml

author: stevenn
msg: There's talks starting at infrastructure@ about more serious checking of release signing and KEYS file, esp. with regards to mirroring. 2.1.2 should be properly signed, cfr. http://www.apache.org/dist/httpd/#sig as an example and http://www.apache.org/~henkp/sig/
